tasks.label: Install Python deps
args: python3 -m venv .venv && source .venv/bin/activate && pip install -r requirements.txt && python -m playwright install --with-deps

tasks.label: Install Playwright Browsers (no sudo)
args: source .venv/bin/activate && python -m playwright install --with-deps --no-sandbox || python -m playwright install

tasks.label: Build executable (PyInstaller)
args: source .venv/bin/activate && pip install pyinstaller && pyinstaller --clean --onefile --name t3bot pyinstaller.spec

tasks.label: Build executable (fixed spec)
args: source .venv/bin/activate && pyinstaller --clean --onefile --name t3bot pyinstaller.spec && ls -lh dist/
